question_text: Why is it recommended to install identical memory modules when using a dual or quad-channel configuration?
answer_options: To reduce voltage fluctuations on the memory bus
To prevent BIOS lockout on startup
To ensure equal access timing and bandwidth across all channels
To allow dynamic switching between single and dual rank
correct_answer: To ensure equal access timing and bandwidth across all channels
explanation: Identical modules allow the memory controller to operate consistently across channels, ensuring maximum bandwidth and reliability.
